meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the January 22, 2025 City Council Meeting
Authorize a three-year contract with West Publishing Corporation
agenda_items.description: for online legal research and associated services utilizing Westlaw for the City Attorney's Office through the Texas Department of Information Resources for the period beginning March 1, 2025 through February 28, 2028

agenda_items.title: Authorize settlement of the bodily injury claims brought by Consuelo Rodriguez
agenda_items.description: in the lawsuit styled, Consuelo Rodriguez v. City of Dallas, Cause No. DC-23-18180

agenda_items.title: Authorize settlement of the lawsuit styled, Mark Ortiz v. City of Dallas
agenda_items.description: and Mary Brown, Dependent Administrator of the Estate of Christi Ruplenas, deceased, v. City of Dallas, Cause No. DC-22-01416

agenda_items.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the professional services contract with Meeder Public Funds, Inc.
agenda_items.description: to exercise the first of two, one-year renewal options for continued investment advisory services

agenda_items.title: Authorize an annual payment to the Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport
agenda_items.description: to provide basic, live fire drills and advanced specialized aircraft/fire training to aircraft-rescue firefighters

agenda_items.title: Authorize the purchase of four Polaris Ranger XP 1000 utility terrain vehicles
Authorize an engineering services contract with Gresham Smith
agenda_items.description: to provide design services to upgrade the five sets of conveyor moving walkways and one set of escalators for the Garages A&B Moving Walkways and Escalator Upgrade at Dallas Love Field

agenda_items.title: Authorize a two-year service contract for a proactive roof maintenance program
agenda_items.presenter: Department of Facilities and Real Estate Management

agenda_items.title: Authorize an amendment to an existing lease agreement with Dallas Children’s Advocacy Center
agenda_items.description: to extend the lease agreement for an additional five years
agenda_items.presenter: Department of Facilities and Real Estate Management

financial_items.description: Authorize a three-year contract with West Publishing Corporation for online legal research and associated services

Authorize the purchase of four Polaris Ranger XP 1000 utility terrain vehicles for the Dallas Police Department
